CustomField.description: NICC-024063 ***THIS FIELD IS DISPLAYED IN THE PARTNER COMMUNITY*** Originally created to display the name of the primary contact that the Amadeus Hospitality Partner should contact. This allows the Partner Community users to see the Customer Contact without giving them access to the Contact object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name of the person at the customer site who should be contacted by the Amadeus Hospitality Partners for subscriptions related to partners.
CustomField.label: Customer Contact
